alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 11:41PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cleburne and central White Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1140 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rose Bud, or 10 miles south of Heber Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Searcy... Bald Knob... Judsonia... Kensett... Higginson... Pangburn... Rose Bud... West Point... Crosby... Gravel Hill... Steprock... Letona... Albion... Dewey... Sidon... Hopewell in Cleburne County... Pickens in White County... Armstrong Springs... Velvet Ridge... Plainview in White County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for eastern, central and north central Arkansas.
